name: Start With No Cat
description:
START WITH NOTHING CAT

You’ve just moved into your own place at the Witch Academy. Obviously, the first thing to do is get your very own cat. And, as every witch knows, the only way you can get a cat is to collect 9 cat souls together

Visit abandoned houses to collect cat souls

CONTROLS

Move with WASD or arrow keys

Cast magic with SPACE

CREDITS

Michael Widmer - Programming

Mert Akbal - 3D art

HOUVV - Art direction

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Wholesome" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
"Sneaky Adventure" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
